The Evillious Chronicles:
Envy Arc Characters

But I have to keep at my work;
I tightly grip my scissors in one hand.
—The Tailor of Enbizaka

Characters associated with Kayo Sudou and the Enbizaka Murder Scandal.

Kayo Sudou

首(す)藤(どう)禍(か)世(よ)sudou kayo

A tailor living in Enbizaka. She is represented by Megurine Luka.

Kai Miroku

三(み)六(ろく)悔(かい)miroku kai

A cloth seller, husband of Mei, and father of Miku and Rin. He is represented by KAITO.

Mei Miroku

三(み)六(ろく)冥(めい)miroku mei

A draper, wife of Kai, and mother of Miku and Rin. She is represented by MEIKO.

Miku Miroku

三(み)六(ろく)三(み)九(く)miroku miku

A teenager living in Enbizaka, daughter of Kai and Mei, and Rin's sister. She is represented by Hatsune Miku.

Rin Miroku

三(み)六(ろく)燐(りん)miroku rin

A teenager living in Enbizaka, daughter of Kai and Mei, and Miku's sister. She is represented by Kagamine Rin.

Elluka Clockworker

エルルカ＝クロックワーカーERURUKA=KUROKKUWAAKAA

A Levin missionary visiting Enbizaka. She is represented by Megurine Luka.

Bufuko Tsukimoto

月(つき)本(もと)ブフ(ブフ)子(こ)tsukimoto BUFUko

Kayo's maid.

Kiji Yarera

キジ＝ヤレラKIJI=YARERA

A businessman working in Enbizaka.

Gakusha

楽(がく)捨(しゃ)gakusha

A travelling Buddhist monk with no memory. He is represented by Camui Gackpo.

Kokutan-douji

黒(こく)檀(たん)童(どう)子(じ)kokutan douji

A boy born from a tree who is travelling across Jakoku to find his mother as instructed to by a mermaid alongside Saruteito and Inukichi. He is represented by Kagamine Len.

Saruteito

猿(さる)帝(てい)都(と)saruteito

A descendant of Chartette and travelling companion of Kokutan-douji and Inukichi. She is represented by Kasane Teto.

Inukichi

犬(いぬ)吉(きち)inukichi

A childhood friend of Kokutan-douji and later his travelling companion alongside Saruteito.

The Scissors

鋏(はさみ)hasami

The spirit inhabiting Kayo's scissors.

The Mermaid

人(にん)魚(ぎょ)ningyo

An inhabitant of the sea who instructed Kokutan-douji to find his mother.
